Message:
Since Grita arrived,
a month’s blown by in a flash!

My health’s even been so good,
it’s practically a miracle!
So, the two of us have been
going out to play every day.

We’ve weaved flower crowns,
watched shooting stars,
and I’m pretty sure we even
took a nap together
one day after lunch!

What we’d finished
were two flower reliefs
Grita and I had been carving.

We both decided to slowly carve
the flower we’d liked the most
at the Flower Festival,
wanting to recreate it somehow.

“Your flower
turned out cute, Lumica.
Even if it is a little rough
around the edges.”

“I could say the same
about yours, you know!”

For some reason,
it was so funny,
we looked at each other
and burst out into laughter.

Grita held out her pinky finger,
which I hooked my own around.
